boardgame.name: Marakesz
Marrakech
Marrakech Giant Edition
Suleika
搶地盤
boardgame.description: In Marrakech each player takes the role of a rug salesperson who tries to outwit the competition. Each player starts with 10 coins and an equal number of carpets._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;On your turn, you may rotate Assam 90 degrees. Then roll the die and move him forward as many spaces as showing (d6: 1, 2, 2, 3, 3, 4). If Assam reaches the edge of the board, follow the curve and continue moving in the next row. If Assam lands on another player's carpet, you must pay that player 1 coin per square showing that is contiguous with the landed-on square. Then, you place one of your carpets orthogonally adjacent to Assam (but may not directly overlay another carpet)._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The game ends when all players have played all carpets. Each gets 1 coin per visible square. The player with most coins wins!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Punched, played once. This game comes with gorgeous components. This is the (superior) German edition; I will include rules in English, and the game itself is language-neutral. The German edition looks slightly different from other editions (and, I think, better). £5 shipping within UK; £12 elsewhere in Europe.

Fundex (FDX 5213) The bazaar is bustling: it’s the big day at the rug market! The best salesperson will soon be named! Each player is a salesperson who tries to outwit the others. Each player has a turn to throw the dice and then move Assam, the market organizer. If Assam stops on an opponent’s run, the salesperson must make a payment to its owner before putting on of their own rug on the adjoining space. When the last rug has been laid, the total number of visible rugs and the number owned by each salesperson are added up: best player wins! Includes game board, 40 wood playing pieces, 6 sided die, 57 fabric tiles, fabric bags and instructions.

Fundex (FDX 5213) The bazaar is bustling: it’s the big day at the rug market! The best salesperson will soon be named! Each player is a salesperson who tries to outwit the others. Each player has a turn to throw the dice and then move Assam, the market organizer. If Assam stops on an opponent’s run, the salesperson must make a payment to its owner before putting on of their own rug on the adjoining space. When the last rug has been laid, the total number of visible rugs and the number owned by each salesperson are added up: best player wins! Includes game board, 40 wood playing pieces, 6 sided die, 57 fabric tiles, fabric bags and instructions.

- 15$ shipping charge in North America - rules in english - règles du jeu en français In Marrakech each player takes the role of a salesperson who tries to outwit the others. In turn each player rolls the dice and then moves Assam, the market organizer. If Assam stops on an opponent’s rug, the player must make a payment to its owner before putting one of their own rugs on an adjacent space. When the last rug has been laid, the total number of visible rugs and the number owned by each salesperson are added up. Le marché aux tapis de la place de Marrakech est sur les dents: on va bientôt désigner le plus habile des marchands. Chacun d’entre eux va tenter d’avoir le plus grand nombre de ses tapis exposés tout en accumulant la plus grande fortune.
